thread.title: Republicans In Congress TURN on Trump, Make Move to Block His Biggest Campaign Promise
thread.title_full: Republicans In Congress TURN on Trump, Make Move to Block His Biggest Campaign Promise

author: John S. Roberts
title: Republicans In Congress TURN on Trump, Make Move to Block His Biggest Campaign Promise
text:
07:25pm February 3, 2017 Do you like this article? 
We all knew that after Donald Trump won the election in November that he was going to face an uphill battle. 
He was going to have to fight hard against socialist Democrats, to be sure. 
But, he was also going to have to battle it out with Congressional RINO’s the entire way, as well. 
Now, 45 is facing resistance from members within his own party about the proposed border wall. 
From Newsmax : 
President Donald Trump is now facing resistance from his own party on his number one campaign pledge — erection of a border wall along Mexico, CNN reported . 
When it comes down to the brass tacks, CNN reports congressional Republicans have one major problem with Trump’s wall – dollars and cents. 
How, exactly, is Trump planning to pay for the estimated $12 billion to $15 billion it’ll take to build the wall? 
“If you’re going to spend that kind of money, you’re going to have to show me where you’re going to get that money,” Alaska Sen. Lisa Murkowski told CNN. “I don’t see how you can get a bill like that through [Congress] without offsets. I don’t see how that’s possible.” 
Get on the same page, people. 
Stop trying to please the left. They aren’t trying to please you! 
Trump’s wall would cost anywhere from $12-$14 billion to construct. 
Illegal immigration costs the American taxpayer over $100 billion. 
What’s the problem? LIKE this article? I hated this article. I'm a liberal.
